306319.「やった！ 火が入りましたね！: Yay! The fire is on, isn't it?

306320.「……文献には 神化するには この炎で\n 魂を焼かねばならないと 書いてありま:
The literature said that to become a god,
one's soul must be burned in this fire.

306321.「肉体ではなく 魂を焼くという炎……。\n この炎に飛び込めば……。:
A flame that burns the soul, not the body. If
you jump into this flame.

306322.「あとは ここで あなたか フォステイルが \n 神になれば 秘伝の間の 開かず:
Now all that's left is for you or Fostail to
become a god here and open the unopened door
to the Secret Room.

306323.「あとは ここで フォステイルが \n 神になれば 秘伝の間の 開かずの扉を\n:
Now all that is left is for Fostail to become
a god here and open the unopened door to the
Secret Room.

306324.「おお！ 神化の光炉じゃないか！\n こんな物まで 用意されていたとは……\n:
Oh! It's a Divine Furnace! I didn't realize
they had prepared such a thing!

306325.「反対側の扉にも 入ってみたんだが\n そっちには 大地の箱舟に よく似た\n:
I went in the other door and found a ride that
looked a lot like the Ark of Earth. I was
astonished!

306326.「フフン。どうやら 最高のタイミングで\n 登場した……って感じかな？:
Hmph. Apparently, it's like he came on the
scene at the best possible time?

306327.「ルーベの監視の 増員も手配できたんで\n 様子を 見にきたんだよ！\n そした:
I was able to arrange for more men to watch
Rubay, so I came by to see how he was doing!
Then I ran into Foss on the way.

306328.「私の助けが 必要になるのではないか……。\n そんな予感が したのさ。\n 実:
I had a feeling that they would need my help.
I have a feeling you might need my help. What
do you really think?

306329.<pc>は 自分か フォステイルの\nどちらかが 神化しなければ\n何も進展しな:
<pc> announced that nothing would
progress unless either he or Fostail were
deified.

306330.「そういうことなら\n 私が 神化を引き受けよう。\n 君は そのままの プクリ:
In that case, I'll take care of the
deification. You can be Pukulipo as you are.

306331.<pc>は フォステイルに\n神化してもらわなければ\n何も進展しないと 告げた:
<pc> informed Fostail that no
progress would be made without deification.

306332.「そういうことなら\n 神化を 引き受けよう。:
In that case, I'll take care of the
deification.

306333.「今度こそ 安全に\n 神化できると考えて よいのだろうね？\n 悪神になるのは:
I suppose we can safely assume that this time
we will be divinized? I don't want to be a
fiend.

306334.「痛いところを つかないでおくれよ。\n 今度という 今度は 万全の態勢を\n:
Please don't touch me where I'm sore. This
time, this time, I'll be ready, I swear to
Lutiana.

306335.「とりあえず この炉を調べるところから\n 始めないとな……。また 招集をかける:
In the meantime, we should start by checking out this furnace. I'll call for another meeting, so feel free to rest in the rest
spot.

306336.<pc>たちは 回生堂に向かった……。:
<pc> and the others headed for the
rest spot.

306337.「おっ 来た来た！ フォステイルの神化が\n もうじき 終わるってよ。:
Oh, here it comes! Fostail's deification will
be finished soon.

306338.「プクリポから 神が誕生すれば\n めでたく 六種族の神が そろいますね。:
If a god is born from Pukulipo, we will have
six gods of the six races.

306339.「神が そろうと……どうなるんだっけ？: What happens when the gods come together?

306340.「……兄ちゃん 忘れちゃったの？\n 六種族の神が ここに つどうと\n あの扉:
Brother, did you forget? When the god of the
six races comes here, that door will be
opened.

306341.「アストルティアの楯の 真のチカラを\n 解放する手段が 扉の向こうにあるんだ。:
The means to unlock the true power of Shield
of Astoltia lies beyond the door.

306342.「石碑に 書いてあったろ。\n ちゃんと 読まなかったのかい？:
It was written in the stone monument. Didn't
you read it correctly?

306343.「復習の意味で 聞いたんだ。\n <pc>が 忘れてるかも しんないだろ。:
I'm just asking for a refresher. You never
know, <pc> might have forgotten
something.

306346.「よろこばしきかな！ また 新たに\n 一柱の神が 顕現するに至った。:
I'm glad to hear it! Another god has been
revealed.

306348.「大げさなのは やめてほしいのだが……。: I wish you would stop exaggerating.

306351.「あやしげな奴め！ 名を名乗れ！: You're a suspicious one! Identify yourself!

306352.「さあ <pc>さま。\n あなたは わたくしたちの中心に。: Come on <pc>. You are our center.

306355.「声の主に 呼ばれているのは\n <pc>さまだけの ようですが\n おひとりで:
It seems that only <pc> is called by
the owner of the voice, but I wonder if I
should let you go alone.

306356.「ひとりきりで 奥まで来いとは\n 言ってなかったろ。私も 同行するとしよう。:
I didn't tell you to come alone to the back.
I'll go with you.

306358.「全員で付いていったら ジア・クトが\n 襲ってきたときに 対処のしようがないね:
If we all follow him, there's no way we can
deal with Dia Kut when he comes at us.

306359.「ならば 私たちは 残って\n 天星郷の守りを 固めるとしましょう。: Then we will stay and defend Heaven.

306360.「誰も いませんね。\n 声の主すら いないとは……。:
No one is here. Not even the owner of the
voice.

306361.「神具の所有者よ。\n よくぞ 神授の間に たどり着いた。:
Owner of the Divine Gifts. You have reached
the Hall of Divine Gifts.

306362.「我は 女神ルティアナ。\n のちの世では アストルティアを\n 創りし者として:
I am the Goddess Lutiana, who in later times
will be remembered as the creator of Astoltia.

306363.「こ この方が 生のルティアナ様！\n お会いしとうございました！:
This is the real Lutiana! I'm so glad to see
you!

306364.「天使長 ルティアナ様は\n ジャゴヌバとの戦いで……。: Archangel Lutiana in battle with Jagonuba.

306366.「このルティアナ様は 神話の時代にでも\n 記録された お姿なのかな……。:
I wonder if this Lady Lutiana is a figure
recorded in Mythical Age.

306367.「神剣と楯を 所有する者よ。\n 汝が 何ゆえ チカラを求めるのか\n じかに:
O possessor of the divine sword and shield. I
cannot ask you directly why you seek power.

306368.「汝が 世界を守らんとする者か\n 私欲のため 強大なチカラを得ようと\n して:
Are you the one who wants to protect the
world, or the one who is just trying to get a
powerful force for your own greed?

306369.「ひとたび 神具のチカラを 解放すれば\n 汝は 我に匹敵しうる存在……\n 創:
Once you unleash the power of the sacred
tools, you will be able to transform into a
being that can rival me, a creator-giant god.

306370.「みだりに与えるのは はばかられる\n 絶大なる チカラであるゆえ これまでの試:
It would be unwise to give it away, for it is of immense power, and so I have had my agents confirm your heart and wisdom in the trial so
far.

306371.「最後に この荒ぶるチカラを \n あつかえるだけの 力量があるかを試す。\n:
Finally, I will test you to see if you are
strong enough to handle this raging power.
Show my servant, the judge, what you can do.

306372.「戦えるのは 神具の所有者のみ。\n 天使や 神々の助力は そのいっさいを禁ず。:
Only the possessor of the sacred artifact may
fight. No help from angels or gods is allowed.

306373.「ここまで 付いてきて\n 見ているだけだなんて……無念です。:
It's a shame that I followed you all the way
here and could only watch.

306374.「信じるよ！ お前なら かならずや\n ルティアナ様のお眼鏡に かなうだろうさ！:
I believe in you! I'm sure you'll be a great
fit for Lutiana!

306375.「我 汝の力量を認める。\n 神具の 秘めたるチカラを 解放しよう。:
I acknowledge thy prowess. I will release the
hidden power of the sacred tool.

306376.「神剣レクタリスと アストルティアの楯。\n その絶大なるチカラの源泉は 協力者:
Divine Sword Lectalis and Shield of Astoltia. The source of their immense power is the fountain that feeds on the lifeblood of the
gods who cooperate with them.

306377.「神剣は 星さえも 両断し\n 楯は 神々と融合し 創生巨神に\n 変化するチカ:
The divine sword has the power to cut down even the stars, and the shield has the power to fuse with the gods and transform into a
creator giant god.

306378.「神具の所有者よ。\n アストルティアの楯を手に\n 我が前に 立つがよい。:
Owner of the sacred artifact. Stand before me
with the Shield of Astoltia in your hand.

306379.アストルティアの楯に 秘められた\n真のチカラが 解放された！:
The true power hidden in the Shield of
Astoltia was unleashed!

306380.「これより 汝は 念じるだけで\n 神々と融合し 霊子のよろいをまといて\n 創:
From now on, you can fuse with the gods with
just your mind and transform into a creature
of the gods, clad in the armor of spirit.

306381.「ひとたび 創生巨神となれば 海を裂き\n 山を砕き 大地を割ることすら たやす:
Once he becomes a creator-giant god, he can
easily split the oceans, shatter mountains,
and even split the earth.

306382.「ただし そのチカラは 無限にあらず。\n 創生巨神の顕現には 融合した 神々の:
However, its power is not infinite. For the
manifestation of the creator giant god, the
lifeblood of the merged gods will be consumed.

306383.「神々の命が 尽き果てる前に 変化は解け\n 回復するまでの間 再び\n 創生巨:
He cannot become a creature giant again until
the change is lifted and he is restored,
before the life of the gods runs out.

306384.「このチカラは いまわしき侵略者……\n ジア・クト念晶体に 対抗するための\n:
This power was prepared as a means to counter
the evil invader Dia Kut telecrystal.

306385.「神化の光炉や 天の箱舟も みな……\n ジア・クトの脅威に そなえるための物。:
The Divine Furnace and the Ark of Heaven are
all designed to prepare for the threat of Dia
Kut.

306386.「もし今 汝が ジア・クトの脅威に\n 直面しているならば 神々や 天使と\n:
If you now face the threat of Dia Kut, join
forces with the gods and angels to overcome
your hardships.

306387.「すべては 最悪の事態を想定しての\n そなえだったのですね。:
Everything was prepared for the worst, wasn't
it?

306388.「ルティアナ様も 本心では\n この神殿が 閉ざされたままであって\n ほしかっ:
I think Lutiana-sama might have really wanted
this temple to remain closed.

306389.「やっぱ 無事だったか。\n さすがだぜ <cs_pchero>！:
I knew you were safe. That's what I'm talking
about, <cs_pchero>!

306390.「帰りが遅いから 様子を見にきたんだけど\n 余計な お世話だったかな。:
I came to check on you since you were home
late, but I guess it was none of my business.

306392.「期待以上の 成果さ。\n ルティアナ様が 我らを想って\n これだけの準備を…:
The results exceeded my expectations. We are
very happy that Lutiana is thinking of us and
has made all these preparations.

306393.<cs_pchero>は ふたりに\n女神ルティアナが 遺してくれた\n記録の内:
<cs_pchero> told them the exact contents of
the record left to them by the Goddess
Lutiana.

306394.「そりゃ すげえな……。\n うまく使えば ジア・クトどもを\n 一掃できるんじ:
That's great. If we use it well, we can wipe
out Dia Kut!

306395.「うまく使えば……か。\n ならば できるだけ 敵の情報をつかんで\n 一撃必殺:
If we use it well. If so, I'd like to get as
much information on the enemy as possible and
aim for a one-hit kill.

306396.「もう一度 ジア・ルーベと\n 向き合わなければ ならないようだね。\n そろそ:
I guess I have to face Dia Rubay again. I hope
you have calmed down by now.

306397.「よし！ 回生堂の２階にある\n ジア・ルーベの部屋に 行ってみるか。:
Okay, I'll go to Dia Rubay's room on the second floor of the rest spot! Let's go to Dia Rubay's room on the second floor of the rest
spot.

306398.「よお！ アタマは 冷えたかい？: Hey there! Is your head cold?

306399.「王の愛などと おだてられ……\n 有頂天になっていた。ルーベたちは 幼さに\n:
They were flattered by the king's love, and were elated. Rubay and the others were taken advantage of by their infancy. By him and
Genos.

306400.「ただの 余興だったの ルーベたちは。: It was just a sideshow for Rubay.

306401.「今なら おたがい 腹を割って\n 話が できるんじゃあないのかい？:
Now would be a good time for you two to have a
heart-to-heart talk, don't you think?

306402.「我々は お前たちのことを\n あまりにも 知らなすぎる。\n 侵略の目的とか:
We know too little about you. The purpose of
the invasion, the joy of life.

306403.「ジア・クト念晶体は 次元のカベを越えて\n 旅する種族。創生のチカラを 収穫す:
Dia Kut telecrystal is a races that travels
across dimensional boundaries to harvest the
power of creation.

306404.「ルーベたち 念晶体は 完全硬化し\n 消滅すると言われている……定期的に\n:
Rubay and his telecrystals are said to be
fully hardened and extinct if they don't
regularly draw on the power of creation.

306405.「ただそこに あるだけで 創生のチカラは\n 万物に宿り 生み出されていくもの。:
Just by being there, the power of creation dwells in all things and is generated. What on earth is the matter with you that you can't do
that?

306406.「ジア・クトの 宿命かもしれない。\n ルーベたちは ほかから 奪うしかないの\:
Maybe that's the fate of Dia Kut. Rubay has no
choice but to take from others, since it
cannot produce the power of creation.

306407.「生きるための 侵略と 収穫か。\n はた迷惑な存在だねぇ……。:
Invasion and harvesting for survival. What a
nuisance.

306408.「ゲノスは 待っている 刻が満ちるのを。\n 大収穫によって この世界の 創生の:
The genos are waiting for the fullness of time. With the great harvest, the power of creation in this world will be reaped by Dia
Kut, root and stem.

306409.「ついに 全軍で しかけてくるのですか！:
At last, they are going to attack us with
their whole army?

306410.「あっは！ そんな 非効率なことはしない。\n 念晶巨人を投下して いっきにやる:
Ah-ha! I don't do inefficient things like
that. Just drop the Telecrystal Titan right
away.

306412.「このフォーリオンなどより ずっと巨大な\n ジア・クトの超兵器。手も足も出せな:
Dia Kut's superweapon is much bigger than this
Fourion and others. It's impossible to get a
hand or a foot out.

306413.「何が おかしいの。\n 錯乱してるの？ 恐怖のあまり。:
What's so funny? Are you delirious? I'm so
scared.

306414.「いやね つい先ほど 我々は\n 巨大化の手段を 手に入れたんだよ。\n かぶっ:
Well, just a few minutes ago, we received the
means to make a giant. I thought we'd gotten
it all wrong.

306415.「しかし 巨人同士で ぶつかりあうんじゃ\n 地上に どれだけの被害が出るか\n:
But if the Titans collide with each other,
there's no telling how much damage they'll
cause on the ground.

306416.「やはり ジア・クトの本拠地\n 魔眼の月を直接 ぶったたいたほうが\n この戦:
After all, it would be better to hit Dia Kut's
stronghold, Eye of Evil, directly to end this
battle sooner rather than later.

306417.「やってみればいい やれるものなら。\n ゲノスが 散るさま……\n かなうなら:
Just try it, if you can do it. If I could, I
would see the genos scattering with my own
eyes.

306418.「魔眼の月を 攻めるつもりなら\n これを あげる。未知の情報を知れるはず。\n:
If you plan to attack the Eye of Evil, I give
you this. You'll learn something you never
knew. About our Fortress of Immortality.

306419.「ただの 腕輪のようだが……。: Looks like it's just a bracelet.

306420.「それは 念晶環。思念を介して\n 格納された情報を 読み取る装置。\n あんた:
It is a telekinesis ring. It is a device that
reads stored information via thoughts. I think
you can handle it.

306421.「おお！ そいつは 大層なモンだねえ。\n ありがたく 活用させてもらうよ！:
Oh! That's a big deal. I'll make good use of
it!

306422.「さっそく 聖天舎に戻って こいつから\n 情報を引き出し 魔眼の月 せん滅作戦:
Let's go back to the monastery and get some
information from him and work out the details
of the Eye of Evil extermination plan.

306423.「久しいな ゆりかごの末裔たちよ。\n 再び まみえる機会を得られて\n 余も:
It's been a long time, Descendants of the
Cradle. I'm glad we have the opportunity to
meet again.

306425.「貴様たちの歴史が 今\n 終わりの時を 迎えようとしている。: Your history is now coming to an end.

306426.「アストルティア文明 とでも言うべき\n 石くれのような 無価値な歴史がな。:
Astoltia civilization, a history as worthless
as a stone.

306427.「その はなむけとして\n 余は 大収穫の決行を指示した。:
As a consolation, I ordered a big harvest to
be held.

306428.「念晶巨人が 創生のチカラを吸いあげる\n 荘厳な光景……しかと 目に焼きつける:
Witness the majestic sight of the Telecrystal
Titan soaking up the power of creation. This
is the prelude to the collapse of Astoltia.

306429.「ちっ！ 悠長に 作戦なんか\n 立ててる場合じゃ ないようだね。:
Damn! I guess this isn't the time to be making
plans for the future.

306430.「全員 そろっているな？\n 今から フォーリオン外郭\n 神都の入り口 手前に:
All of you are here, right? From now on,
gather at the plaza in front of the entrance
to the Outer Fourion.

306431.「広場の床に 天使をモチーフにした\n モザイク画がある。その辺りで\n <pc:
There is a mosaic of angels on the floor of
the plaza. I'll ask <pc> to use the
ritual tools around there.

306432.戦う準備を ととのえて\nフォーリオン外郭 神都の門の\n入り口のあたりにある:
Prepare for battle and examine the mosaic
around the entrance to the Outer Fourion Deity
Gate.

306433.「これから 神具 アストルティアの楯を使い\n <cs_pchero>に 創生巨:
From now on, I will use the Shield of Astoltia
to have <cs_pchero> change into a creator
giant god.

306434.「チカラの解放には 使用者のみならず\n この場につどった すべての英雄……\n:
The cooperation of not only the user but also all the heroes, or gods, who have been present at this place is indispensable for the release
of power.

306435.「ルティアナ様によると \n 創生巨神の動力源は 神々の命脈……\n つまり 命:
According to Lutiana-sama, the power source of
the creator-giant gods is the lifeblood of the
gods, that is, life itself.

306436.「もう 覚悟はできている。\n 神授の間で 聞いたことは\n 皆に 話しておいた:
I'm already prepared. I told everyone what I
heard at the Hall of Divine Gifts.

306437.「……そうだったか。\n ぶっつけ本番になるが 頼む。:
I see. I'll have to do it on the spur of the
moment, but I'll be counting on you.

306438.「<cs_pchero>。いつでも いいぜ。\n 神具のチカラを 使ってくれ。:
<cs_pchero>. Whenever you want. Use the
power of the sacred tools.

306439.<cs_pchero>は 創生巨神に\n変化するよう 強く念じた。:
<cs_pchero> was strongly reminded to change
into the creature-gods.

306440.「うっひょおおお！ すっげー！\n 身体が 光り出したぞ！\n このあと どうな:
Whoo-hoo! Wow! My body is glowing! What's
going to happen now?

306441.「兄者 うるさい！\n <cs_pchero>が 集中してんだから\n ジャマす:
Brother, shut up! Don't interrupt me while I'm
concentrating on <cs_pchero>!

306442.「ダメだ！ 神都から はなれてくれ！\n 荷重に耐えられない！:
No, you can't! Get away from the capital! I
can't bear the load!

306443.<cs_pchero>と融合した 英雄たちの声が\n頭の中から 聞こえてきた。:
I could hear the voices of heroes merging with
<cs_pchero> from inside my head.

306444.「<cs_pchero>の 見ている物が\n 俺にも見えるぞ！ みんなは どうだ:
I can see what <cs_pchero> is seeing! How
about you guys?

306445.「ボクにも しっかり 見えてます。\n でも 身体を動かす自由は ないみたい。:
I can see them clearly. But I don't seem to
have the freedom to move my body.

306446.「おーい 聞こえるかぁ！\n 神剣レクタリスを 出してみろぉ！:
Hey, can you hear me? Let's get out the Divine
Sword Lectalis!

306447.「よっしゃあ！ そいつで 魔眼の月を\n 直接 ぶった切っておくれー！:
All right! Cut the Eye of Evil directly with
that thing!

306448.「今の お前なら 造作もないはずだ。\n 魔眼の月は レンダーシアの上空に見える:
You should be able to do it now. The Eye of
Evil is visible above Lendersia. I'm counting
on you! <cs_pchero>!

306449.「私にできることは\n もう ないのでしょうか……。: Is there anything more I can do?

306450.「今は 彼らを信じ 結果を待とう。\n お前が選んだ英雄を お前が信じないで\n:
For now, let's trust them and wait for the
results. What if you don't believe in the
heroes you've chosen? It's going to work out.

306451.「くっそ……魔眼の月は まだ遠いな。: Damn, Eye of Evil is still a long way off.

306452.「待って！ 月から 何かが！: Wait! It's something from the moon!

306453.「あの光……まさか 創生のチカラ？:
That light... You don't think it's the power
of creation?

306454.「ちゅー ちゅー 吸い取ってやがる……。\n あのデカブツが ゲノスの言っていた:
He's sucking it out. Is that DeKabutu the
Telecrystal Titan that Genos was talking
about?

306456.「ここは 当初の目的どおり\n 魔眼の月の破壊に 向かうべきでは……。:
We should go for the destruction of Eye of
Evil as we originally intended.

306457.「いや ほっとけねえな……。肩慣らしにも\n ちょうどいいし あのデクの坊を倒し:
I can't leave him alone. It's a good time for me to get used to the new rules, so let's take down that Deku kid and then beat up the Eye of
Evil!

306458.「<cs_pchero>さん！\n 今こそ 神剣で トドメを！:
<cs_pchero>! Now is the time to finish him
off with the divine sword!

306459.「しぶてぇなあ！ どてっ腹に\n 一発 お見舞いしてやれッ！:
You stubborn son of a bitch! Give him a shot
to the gut!

306460.「くっそ……あと ちょっとだってのに\n なんで 元に戻っちまうんだ……。:
Damn it, why is it going back to the way it
was just a little while ago?

306461.「巨神化は 我ら 神の命脈を使って\n おこなわれるそうだからな……。\n これ:
I heard that the transformation into a giant
god is done with the lifeblood of our god.
This must have been the limit.

306463.「この調子じゃ 当分\n 巨神には なれそうにないぜ。\n 魔眼の月は どうすん:
At this rate, I don't think I'll become a
giant god for a while. What about Eye of Evil?

306464.「あの……魔眼の月を たたくのは\n もちろん 重要だけど……念晶巨人の部品が\:
While it is, of course, important to hit that
Eye of Evil, I'm concerned that the
Telecrystal Titan parts are still there.

306465.「わたくしも ドルタムさまと 同意見です。\n あれは 不吉な物に感じます……。:
I agree with Mr. Doltam. It feels ominous. Why
don't we think about the moon later?

306466.「巨人の部品が 落下したのは\n 大エテーネ島の 方角だったね。\n とりあえず:
The parts of the giant fell in the direction
of Great Ethene Isle. Let's go closer to the
site.

306467.「あんな巨大な物を 今の我々に\n 壊せるのでしょうか……。:
I wonder if we are capable of destroying such
a huge object today.

306468.「へへっ！ オレに まかせとけ！\n ……うぉおおおおおおッ！:
Heh heh! Leave it to me! Whoa, whoa, whoa,
whoa!

306469.「うへー。\n さすがに ムリかぁ……。: Ugh. As expected, I can't do it.

306471.「あああー！？ 兄者のバカー！\n 余計なこと するからーッ！！:
Aaahhh! My brother's fool! You're doing
unnecessary things!

306473.「あの光は 創生のチカラ……\n 魔眼の月へ 送っているのか！？:
Is that light sending the power of creation to
the Eye of Evil?

306474.「早く あれを壊さねば\n ジア・クトを 利することになる。\n 何か 手はない:
If we don't destroy it soon, we will be taking
advantage of Dia Kut. Is there anything we can
do?

306475.「先ほど カブさまがやったように\n 自分たちの ありったけの チカラを\n 神:
How about putting all of our power into the
sacred sword as Kabu-sama did just now?

306476.「アストルティアの楯と同様 神剣レクタリスに \n 命脈をそそげば あれを 砕け:
If you put your lifeblood into the Divine Sword Lectalis as well as the Shield of Astoltia, you may be able to gain enough power
to shatter it.

306477.「審判の天使 ヘルヴェルも\n 同じようなことをして ジア・クトの船を\n 退け:
I heard that the Angel of Judgement, Helvel,
did the same thing to get rid of Dia Kut's
ship.

306478.「ためしてみる価値は ありそうだ。\n <cs_pchero>！ 神剣を出してく:
Worth a try. <cs_pchero>! Bring out the
divine sword.

306480.「みなさんは ボクが守ります！\n その間に 神剣を！:
I will protect you all! In the meantime, I
need the sacred sword!

306481.「無茶だ <cs_pchero>！\n ひとりで 相手にできる数じゃねえ！:
That's absurd <cs_pchero>! That's a lot of
people to deal with!

306482.「行くな！ キミまで抜けたら 神剣のチカラを\n 維持できない！ 奴らを 食い止:
Don't go! If we get through to you, we won't
be able to maintain the power of the God
Sword! We'll finish them off while we can!

306484.「あなたの声が 聞こえた気がしたの。\n 心のままに動いて 正解だったわ。:
I thought I heard your voice. I was right to
follow my heart.

306485.「状況は よく わからないけれど\n あの敵を 食い止めれば いいのよね？:
I don't know what's going on, but we have to
stop them, right?

306486.「勇者と盟友が そろったからには\n 一歩も 先へ通さない！！:
Once Hero and Ally are aligned, they will not
go one step further!

306489.「私も 治療をしてほしいと 頼まれて\n 来たばかりなので 何が何やら……。:
I just came here to ask you to treat me, too,
so I don't know what's going on.

306490.「炉のような物の そばで 倒れていたので\n これと 関係があるのかも しれませ:
It may have something to do with the fact that
he collapsed near what appeared to be a
furnace.

306492.「まさか 神化の炎に 飛び込んだのか！:
No way. You jumped into the fire of
deification!

306493.「この 初期型の光炉が 作られた当時は\n 魂の燭台が 使われていなかった。神化:
At the time this early type of furnace was made, Soul Candles were not used. The only way to deify a soul is to burn it directly with
the flame of deification.

306494.「星巡りを乗り越えた 英雄ならばともかく\n ただの天使の身で そんなことをすれ:
If you were a hero who had survived the star- crossed journey, but if you were just an angel, you didn't know what would happen to
you.

306495.「ヤケドなどの 外傷はありません。\n なんだって こんな無茶を……。:
There are no burns or other external injuries.
How could you be so reckless?

306496.「私にできることは\n もう ないのでしょうか……。: Is there anything more I can do?

306499.「いや ユーライザを運んでやろう。\n ここでは ろくな治療も できんだろうしな:
No, let's take Yuliza with us. We can't do
much good here.

306500.「アシュレイを失い 創生巨神という\n 切り札を失ったが ほかに手はないか……\:
Now that we've lost Ashley, we've lost our trump card in the form of a creator god, but we need to figure out what else we can do
before Dia Kut makes her move.

306501.「お前も それまで 英気を養っててくれ。\n こちらから 追って連絡する。:
Until then, you too, keep your strength up. We
will contact you shortly.

306503.「どうも こうも……\n すっかり ムシを決め込んでます。:
They completely given up on everything,
it seems like...

306504.「ジア・ルーベといったか？\n 私は ミトラー。この天星郷の長だ。:
Dia Rubay, was it? I am Mitra, head of the
Firmament.

306505.「道連れ……砕けろ……？ ありえない。\n どの念晶体よりも ゲノス様の寵愛を\:
As collateral...shatter...? Impossible.
We were favored by the great Genos more than
any other. We were two special fragments...

306506.「特別ぅ？ 聞いて あきれるねえ。: Special? How surprising to hear you say that.

306507.「お前は 敵地で とらわれの身。\n 頼みの綱の ゲノス様は 救援ひとつ\n 寄:
You are a captive in enemy territory. This great Genos, your only hope...he hasn't made a single attempt to rescue you. You were
abandoned.

306508.「そんなはずない！！\n ルーベと サフィルは 特別なの！\n 王の愛と 王の叡:
That cannot be! Rubay and Saphir ARE special!
We are the ruler's beloved, the ruler's
wisdom!

306509.「でもさぁ 相方は 気づいていたようだぞ。\n 思い返してみな。お前たちの あの:
But you know what? It looks like your partner
noticed it. Think about it. That crown of
yours was a mere tool to destroy your enemies.

306510.「いつまで 目を そらし続けるんだい？\n そんなだから 相方から\n バカ呼ば:
How long are you going to keep ignoring it?
This is exactly why your partner kept calling
you a fool!

306511.「黙れ！！ 引き裂いてやる！ そのクチを！:
SHUT UP!! I'll tear it off! That mouth of
yours!!

306513.「返せ！ 下等種族が 触れるな。\n サフィルの心が けがれる！:
Give it! You lowly species should not touch
it. Saphir's heart is broken!

306514.「はい そうですかって 返せるワケないだろ。\n 武器のたぐいかも しれないって:
As if I can respond with "Sure, go ahead."
It could be a weapon for all we know.

306515.「返して。もう 戦う意思はない。\n それは……サフィルの心だから\n 武器じゃ:
Give it back... We don't want to fight
anymore. Saphir's heart...it's no weapon.

306516.サフィルの心核を ジア・ルーベに渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Give Saphir's Core to Dia Rubay?<yesno><close>

306517.「返して。もう 戦う意思はない。\n それは……サフィルの心だから\n 武器じゃ:
Give it back... We don't want to fight
anymore. Saphir's heart...it's no weapon.

306518.サフィルの心核を ジア・ルーベに渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Give Saphir's Core to Dia Rubay?<yesno><close>

306519.<pc>は サフィルの心核を\nジア・ルーベに渡した。:
<pc> handed Saphir's Core over to
Dia Rubay.

306520.「念晶体の構造を 作り変える施術は\n 激痛を ともなったはずだ。:
The procedure to remodel your telecrystal
structure must have been extremely painful.

306521.「研磨に耐え抜いた お前たちは\n 原石として より 輝きを増した。:
You two have endured the process of polishing.
As Prime Stones, you have become even more
brilliant.

306522.「クルヴィダの王冠を 授与する。\n たとえ 敵陣にあろうと 王冠を通じ\n 余:
I bestow upon you Kuruvida's Crown. Even if
you are behind enemy lines, you and I shall
be connected through it.

306523.「王冠の輝きが 頂点に達したとき\n 余の愛し子たる お前たちに 助勢を与える。:
When the crown's brilliance reaches its zenith, it shall grant assistance to you, my beloved children. It will become a
power that will vanquish your enemies.

306524.「王より たまわった冠は\n 能力を増強させる 道具であり\n 敗北したワタシた:
The crown given to use by our ruler is a tool
meant to enhance our abilities...and a tool
to destroy us upon our defeat.

306525.「我が王は せめて 敵を道連れに\n ここで砕けよと 言っているんだ。:
Our ruler...his words say that he wishes for
us to shatter, and at the very least, take
our enemies as collateral.

306526.「余の叡智。特別なかけらたる お前を\n ルミナのように ムダに死なせはせぬ。:
My wisdom. As a special fragment, I will not
allow your death to be in vain like that of
Dia Lumina's.

306527.「せめて 敵を巻き添えに……。\n これが ムダのない死か！:
At the very least, use it to take your enemies
down with you...
Is this not dying in vain!?

306528.「愛だの 叡智だの……ただの まやかし！\n ワタシたちは あまりに幼かった。\:
Love, and wisdom...we were deceived!
We were too young. We were taken advantage
of! We could not see it!

306529.「馬鹿ルーベ…… せめて お前だけでも。: Foolish Rubay... At the very least, you...

306531.「こりゃあ 手が付けられないね。\n いったん 退散するとしよう。:
This is going nowhere fast. We should leave
for now.

306532.「よかった！ 行き違いにならなくて！\n 聖天舎に うかがったのですが\n 出か:
Thank goodness I ran into you! I went to the
monastery, but they said you'd gone out...

306534.「とこしえの神殿の 楯の間を\n 片付けていたら 地下におりる しかけが\n 見:
We received a report that during cleaning of the Shield Room in the Temple of Eternity, a hidden passage leading underground was
discovered.

306535.「あそこは 長らく\n 結界で 閉ざされていたからな……。\n 未知の場所があっ:
That place has been closed off for a very
long time due to the ward... I'm not surprised
that there are some unknown parts of it.

306536.「すぐにでも 見にいきたいところだが\n ルーベの監視に 不安が残るな……。\n:
I'd like to go and take a look right now, but I'm worried about Rubay's surveillance. I'll go and make some quick arrangements for
some more people to watch her.

306537.「地下のほうは 先に ふたりで調べてくれ。\n 楯の間は 盟友の虚無を 抜けた先:
You two can go check out that underground area first. The shield room is just past the Ally's Void, isn't it? That brings back some bad
memories...

306538.「そろそろ いいんじゃないのか。\n 早くしないと あいつらも 持たねえぞ！:
It's about time. If we don't do it soon, they
won't last long!

306540.「いそげっ！ もう一度 振り下ろすぞ！: Hurry up! Let's swing down again!

306542.「でかしたぞ ふたりとも！\n あとは 俺にまかせて 休んでな！:
Good job, both of you! I'll take care of the
rest. You get some rest!

306543.「そんな！ 私たちも まだやれます！: Oh, no! We can still do it!

306544.「もう 限界なんだろ？\n 先輩の言うことは 聞いとけって。:
You've reached your limit, haven't you? You
should listen to your senpai.

306545.「……当代の勇者。会えて うれしかったぜ。\n お前は 盟友の手を はなすんじゃ:
It was nice to meet you, Hero of the day.
Don't let go of Ally's hand!

306546.「念晶巨人を失ったのは 痛手よなぁ……。: Losing Telecrystal Titan must be a blow.

306547.「まあ 創生のチカラは 十分 獲れた。\n これで 滅浄の大光を撃てよう。:
Well, I've captured enough power to create.
With this, I can shoot the great light of
destruction and purification.

306548.「滅浄の刻をもって この文明は滅ぶ。\n 残された日々……大切に過ごせよ ククク:
This civilization will be destroyed in the
time of purification. Spend your remaining
days carefully!

306551.<cs_pchero>は 彼らが 天星郷で復活した\nアストルティアの 英雄たち:
<cs_pchero> confided to Anlucia that they
were the heroes of Astoltia resurrected in
Heaven.

306552.「当代の勇者 アンルシアです。\n 歴史に名を刻んだ 英雄の皆さま方に\n お会:
I am Hero Anlucia, and I am honored to meet all of you, the heroes of our history. It is an honor to meet all of the heroes who have
made their mark on history.

306553.「先ほどは 助けていただき\n ありがとうございました。勇者アシュレイ。: Thank you for your help earlier Hero Ashley.

306554.「勇者が 助けにきてくれたんだ。\n 小柄な……かわいらしい子だったよ。:
Hero came to my rescue. She was a cute little
girl.

306556.「天星郷に 戻りましょう！\n いそがないと 手遅れになります。:
Let's get back to Heaven! If you don't hurry,
it will be too late.

306558.「羽根飾り……まだ 持っててくれたんだな。\n 今度は もっと いいのを 作って:
I'm glad you still have the feather ornament.
I'll make you a better one this time.

306559.「<cs_pchero>。私も ジア・クトと戦うわ！\n いっしょに行かせて。\:
<cs_pchero>. I'll fight Dia Kut too! Let me
go with you. As a Hero, I can't help but do
something.

306560.「気持ちは うれしいが……英雄ならぬ身で\n 天星郷には 立ち入れぬ。今すぐ\n:
I appreciate the sentiment, but I am not a
hero and I cannot enter Heaven. It would be
difficult for me to join the ranks right now.

306561.「また 地上をねらった ジア・クトの侵攻が\n あるかもしれません。勇者さまは:
Hero, please protect the people of Astoltia
who are living in the present.

306562.「……わかりました。当代の勇者として\n 地上を守る つとめを果たすことで\n:
I understand. As the Hero of our time, I will
do my duty to protect the earth and help you
in your fight.

306563.「でも 助けが必要な時は いつでも呼んで。\n いいわね？ <cs_pchero:
But if you need help, you call me anytime.
Okay? <cs_pchero>.

306564.「それでは 失礼します。英雄の皆さま方。\n いつの日か 再会できることを 願っ:
Now, if you'll excuse me. To all the heroes. I
hope we can meet again someday.

306565.「たとえ 神になろうとも\n 命脈を使い果たせば 跡形もなく消える……。\n こ:
Even if we become gods, if we exhaust our
veins, we will disappear without a trace. This
is our fate.

306567.「フフ 同感です。でも こんなにも早く\n 別れが おとずれるなんて……。:
I agree. But I can't believe that the goodbye
came so soon.

306568.「たとえ ひとたび 生を終えた身であっても\n こればかりは……つらいものだな。:
Even if you've already lived your life, it's
still hard.

306569.「今夜は 弔い酒だ！ 派手に送ってやろうぜ！\n しみったれたのを 一番 きらう:
Tonight is the mourning drink! Let's send him
off with a bang! You used to be the kind of
guy who hated being sullied the most.

312343.ジア・クルヴィダを 倒したときに手に入れた\nサフィルの心核が 突然 ふるえだし:
Saphir's Core from the defeated Dia Kuruvida
suddenly began shaking.

312344.ジア・ルーベの言葉に 同意するように\nサフィルの心核が 大きく 鼓動を打った。:
Saphir's Core beats loudly in agreement with
Dia Rubay's words. It doesn't seem
particularly dangerous.

312345.ジア・ルーベの言葉に 同意するように\nサフィルの心核が 大きく 鼓動を打った。:
Saphir's Core beats loudly in agreement with
Dia Rubay's words. It doesn't seem
particularly dangerous.

312346.「知りたいの。サフィルの心が。: We must know...what's inside Saphir's heart...

312347.<pc>たちは 回生堂に入り\n２階にある ジア・ルーベが\n軟禁されている部屋:
<pc> and others entered the rest spot
and headed upstairs to the room where Dia
Rubay is under house arrest.

312348.「急がねえと……修行に 遅れちまう。\n 師匠は 気が 短けえ から……。:
If you don't hurry, you'll be late for your
training. Master has a short temper.

314670.<center>アストルティアの子よ。\nそして 各種族から生まれた神々よ。:
O son of Astoltia! And from each races born
gods.

314671.<center>アストルティアの楯の チカラの解放を\n望むなら 神具の所有者は:
If you wish to release the power of the Shield of Astoltia, the owner of the sacred object may stand on the crest of the center, and the
gods may stand around it.

314672.<center>神具の所有者が\n神々の信頼を得た 人物であると認める。:
Acknowledge that the owner of the sacred
object is a person who has earned the trust of
the gods.

314673.<center>秘密殿に至る扉を 解放しよう。\n汝 神具解放の試練を 乗り越え:
I will free the door to the Hall of Secrets. You must overcome the trial for the release of the sacred tools and come to the Hall of
Divine Gifts at the far end.
